org.jgrapes.osgi.core

Class ComponentCollector<F extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentFactory>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.ComponentVertex
      • org.jgrapes.core.Component
        • org.jgrapes.osgi.core.ComponentCollector<F>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType>, org.jgrapes.core.Channel, org.jgrapes.core.ComponentType, org.jgrapes.core.Eligible, org.jgrapes.core.Manager, org.osgi.util.tracker.ServiceTrackerCustomizer<F,F>

    public class ComponentCollector<F extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentFactory>
extends org.jgrapes.core.Component
implements org.osgi.util.tracker.ServiceTrackerCustomizer<F,F>

    An advanced version of the basic ComponentCollector that is based on the OSGi registry and not on the ServiceLoader.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.jgrapes.core.Channel

    • Method Detail

      • addingService

        public F addingService(org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference<F> reference)

        Whenever a new factory is added, it is used to create component instances with this component’s channel. First, the matcher function passed to the constructor is invoked with the name of the class of the component to be created as argument. The list of maps returned is used to create components, passing each element in the list as parameter to ComponentFactory.create(Channel, Map). The map return from the matcher is automatically augmented with an entry with key BundleContext.class and the bundle context passed to the constructor.

        Specified by:
        addingService in interface org.osgi.util.tracker.ServiceTrackerCustomizer<F extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentFactory,F extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentFactory>
        See Also:
        ServiceTrackerCustomizer.addingService(ServiceReference)

      • modifiedService

        public void modifiedService(org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference<F> reference,
                            F service)
        Specified by:
        modifiedService in interface org.osgi.util.tracker.ServiceTrackerCustomizer<F extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentFactory,F extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentFactory>

      • removedService

        public void removedService(org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference<F> reference,
                           F service)

        Removes all child component with the type produced by the factory that is removed. A (possibly) final Stop event is send to the detached subtrees which may be used to deactivate bundles.

        Specified by:
        removedService in interface org.osgi.util.tracker.ServiceTrackerCustomizer<F extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentFactory,F extends org.jgrapes.core.ComponentFactory>
        See Also:
        ServiceTrackerCustomizer.removedService(ServiceReference, Object)
